detail_desc: Short, A-line skirt in a sturdy, textured weave with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Satin inner skirt.
Flared, calf-length skirt in patterned cotton. High waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip in one side. Unlined.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back.
Short skirt in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High waist, a concealed zip in one side and two flounced tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Short skirt in a cotton weave. Regular waist with elasticated smocking, and a seam at the hem with a wide broderie anglaise flounce. Lined.
Long skirt in pleated, heavily draping satin. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Short skirt in sturdy, stretch, textured jersey with large patch pockets, an extended waistband with a press-stud at the front, and a visible zip down the front.
Calf-length skirt in satin with a high waist and decorative ties at the front. Concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Calf-length, batik-patterned skirt in Tencel™ lyocell with a tie-front and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short skirt in woven fabric with smocking at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in a crinkled weave with an elasticated waist and faux wrapover with ties at the front.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Flared, pleated, knee-length skirt in a rib knit with a sheen. High, elasticated waist.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover with ties and a concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and decorative seams. Lined.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. High, elasticated waist. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with pleats, buttons down the front and high slits. Unlined.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in ribbed jersey with concealed elastication at the waist. Jersey lining.
High-waisted shorts in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell with a rope-look tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, fitted skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable belt and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with decorative buttons down the front, a fake fly and raw-edge, cut-off hem. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Knee-length skirt in a sturdy weave with decorative metal rings at the top, a slit at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, coin pocket, front and back pockets and slit at the back.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Decorative buttons at the front and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Short skirt in woven fabric made from a linen blend with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top, buttons down the front and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping, pleated satin with a visible, elasticated, ribbed waistband. Lined.
Short skirt in a soft weave with a high waist and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets, pleats front and back and a concealed zip and button at the back.
Long skirt in pleated, heavily draping satin. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Long, pleated skirt in a softly draping crêpe weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in jersey crêpe with a high waist with concealed elastication, a wrapover front with a draped knot detail at one side and an asymmetric hem.
Knee-length skirt in soft jersey made from a modal blend. The skirt fits over the tummy and has concealed elastication at the waistband. Decorative seams down the front and back. Unlined.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in sturdy, patterned jersey with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Double-layered waistband and a slit at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and button at the back, and seam with a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in bouclé made from a cotton blend. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and fake front pockets with a decorative flap. Lined.
Short, circular skirt woven in an airy linen blend with a concealed zip at the waist and a gathered seam at the hips. Lined.
Short, gently flared skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back and a high waist with a decorative metal buckle at the front.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and a wide seam centre front to create a draped effect. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a soft knit containing some wool. High waist with a wide, ribbed waistband, a ribbed hem and a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Short skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and pleats at the top to create soft draping. Unlined.
Short skirt in sturdy, stretch, textured jersey with large patch pockets, an extended waistband with a press-stud at the front, and a visible zip down the front.
Short skirt in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a high, ribbed waistband, and a slit at the back of the hem.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and a concealed zip and button at the back. Lined.
Long, pleated skirt in a softly draping crêpe weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in chiffon with double pleats at the top, a sewn-in tie belt, concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide tie belt. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with draping. Unlined.
Short skirt in a soft weave with a high waist and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets, pleats front and back and a concealed zip and button at the back.
Wide, calf-length skirt in an airy cotton weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short skirt in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a high waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and a wide seam centre front to create a draped effect. Unlined.
Short skirt in patterned viscose jersey with wide smocking at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Short, tiered skirt in an airy cotton weave. Regular waist with wide smocking.
Long, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim. Lined.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.
Flared, knee-length skirt in cotton satin. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, a detachable, braided belt and a large flap patch pocket on each side. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
